entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 16.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then clearing. Blowing snow this morning. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
